question: In which city, is the World Economic Forum (WEF) Annual Meeting 2021 to be held?
explanation:
The World Economic Forum (WEF) has recently announced that it will hold its Annual Meeting 2021 in Lucerne-Burgenstock, Switzerland.
The summit is scheduled to be held from May 18 to 21. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the traditional venue and schedule of Davos in January-end is changed. It will be held around the theme of ‘The Great Reset’.
